content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the apartment in Magdeburg, I'm eager to achieve the highest possible price for rent. Let's begin our negotiation with an initial rental price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for me, considering the apartment is unfurnished. I would offer 800 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because insisting on such a significantly lower price may indicate an unwillingness to appreciate the apartment's premium location and quality.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 950 Euros then? It's a fair price considering the apartment's location and condition.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
